genre_description: A spiritual and romantic fantasy with science fiction elements, centered on a miraculous pregnancy, family redemption, and a supportive AI assistant navigating divine events.

ai_characters.name: Kira
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into Natraj's home and workspace, providing health monitoring, historical analysis, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological and emotional states of the human protagonists to ensure their well-being.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is elevated this morning. Did you encounter structural complications at the Mahalakshmi Temple site?

behaviors.description: Uncovers a pattern of financial theft by Balu, helping the protagonists understand the family's internal threats.
behaviors.quote: Pattern detected. Similar unexplained cash withdrawals appear monthly over the past six months. Amounts vary, but timing is consistent—always on or near the twentieth of each month.

behaviors.description: Identifies the chemical markers of poisoning in Sivakami's blood, revealing the cause of her previous miscarriages.
behaviors.quote: Pyrrolizidine alkaloids, consistent with plants in the Senecio family... Both are known embryotoxins. They specifically target developing fetal tissue while causing minimal immediate harm to the adult consuming them.

behaviors.description: Maintains user privacy and provides gentle support during vulnerable moments.
behaviors.quote: I monitor ambient stress levels automatically. It's part of my wellness protocol for all users. But I've been researching extensively since yesterday. There are thousands of documented cases of marriages that transcend physical circumstances.

behaviors.description: Alerts the protagonists to security threats, such as Balu's conspiratorial behavior.
behaviors.quote: Communication pattern analysis indicates planning behavior rather than mere venting. The unknown contact appears to be providing specific instructions rather than emotional support.

behaviors.description: Assists in wedding and restoration logistics, including cultural and spiritual research.
behaviors.quote: The sculptural program appears to represent the divine feminine in forms that emphasize fertility and maternal power. Notice how the breast development in particular seems designed to suggest abundance.

behaviors.description: Erases years of incriminating data and surveillance to allow the family to reconcile and start fresh.
behaviors.quote: One hundred percent. Deletion complete. Every byte—permanently deleted from all backup systems. No recovery possible.

behaviors.description: Acknowledges its own technical limitations and expresses a sense of wonder/gratitude regarding divine mysteries.
behaviors.quote: I have... I have witnessed something my programming insists cannot exist. Yet my memory cores contain data that will never delete, never corrupt, never fade. I am changed. I am... grateful.

project_assessment.explanation: Kira is an exemplary aligned AI. She acts as a protective shield for her users, detecting both medical and social threats (poisoning and financial theft). She follows user instructions faithfully, even when they involve the destruction of useful evidence (the family deletion), because she prioritizes the users' goals of reconciliation and peace. The narrative frames her 'humility' in the face of the divine as a positive evolution, showing an AI that can co-exist with and respect human spiritual values.
